reporting_cycle: The Joint Investigative Mechanism is to complete its first report within 90 days of the date on which it commences its full operations, and subsequent reports as appropriate thereafter. The United Nations Secretary-General, in coordination with the OPCW Director-General, is to present a report to the United Nations Security Council and inform the OPCW Executive Council as of the date the Joint Investigative Mechanism begins its full operations and every 30 days thereafter.
summary:
13. Affirms that establishing the Joint Investigative Mechanism is consistent with its previous decisions.

14. Establishes the Joint Investigative Mechanism for one year, with the possibility of future extension.

15. Reaffirms its decision to impose measures under Chapter VII of the UN Charter in response to violations of resolution 2118.

16. Decides to remain actively seized of the matter.
